--set.help: Override key=value in args across stages

--trace.help: Shell-style trace: print '+ <command>' and working directory per stage

--strict-env.help: Fail if ${VAR} placeholders are not set in environment

--max-workers.help: When config is a workflow.yml, run up to N jobs in parallel

--watch.help: When config is a workflow.yml, evaluate triggers and run if active

--run-on-first.help: Trigger a run when no prior state exists (workflow.yml watch)

--watch-interval.help: When --watch is set, poll every N seconds (default: single poll)

--watch-count.help: When --watch is set with --watch-interval, stop after N iterations

options.--log-file: Write runner and stage logs to the given file
options.--log-dir: Write logs under this directory as workflow.log
